20200503142729.title: Learn how to use OpenGL GLFW instead of GLUT
20200503142729.author: Ankit Kumar Verma
20200503142729.description: GLFW is a lightweight utility library for use with OpenGL. Use GLFW for context instead of GLUT. Learn how to use GLFW with python with an example.

20200503142857.title: Work with Modern GL and GLSL
20200503142857.author: Ankit Kumar Verma
20200503142857.description: Do you want to learn how to give shades to objects using modern GL? GLSL can help you. Learn how to use GLSL with python.

20200503143009.title: Python Data Structures List, Tuple, Set and Dictionary
20200503143009.author: Ankit Kumar Verma
20200503143009.description: Get the basic idea of the built-in Data Structures in Python i.e. Python List, Tuple, Set and Dictionary

20200503143102.title: XAMPP and PHP
20200503143102.author: Ankit Kumar Verma
20200503143102.description: How to run a XAMPP server in linux and how to launch it. Got stuck with XAMPP server problems, this may help you.

20200503143139.title: Linux Commands
20200503143139.author: Ankit Kumar Verma
20200503143139.description: Experience some useful linux commands (specially for Ubuntu).

20200503143221.title: Learn Django from scratch [OnGoing]
20200503143221.author: Ankit Kumar Verma
20200503143221.description: Django is a Python-based free and open-source web framework, which follows the model-template-view architectural pattern. Just go through this short tutorial to learn all about Django. It will give you an idea, that how Django works and what you can do with Django.
